mapper.select: SELECT ir.* FROM iam_role ir LEFT JOIN iam_role_label irl ON ir.id = irl.role_id INNER JOIN iam_label il ON irl.label_id = il.id WHERE ir.h_tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND il.name = #{labelName}

SELECT ir.* FROM iam_role ir LEFT JOIN hiam_label_rel hlr ON ir.id = hlr.data_id INNER JOIN iam_label il ON hlr.label_id = il.id
hlr.data_type = 'ROLE' AND ir.h_tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND il.name = #{labelName} AND il.type = 'ROLE'
AND ir.name LIKE concat(concat('%', #{param.name}), '%')

SELECT ir.* FROM iam_member_role imr LEFT JOIN iam_role ir ON ir.id = imr.role_id LEFT JOIN hiam_label_rel hlr on hlr.data_id = ir.id LEFT JOIN iam_label il ON il.id = hlr.label_id WHERE imr.member_type = 'user' AND imr.source_type = 'organization' AND imr.source_id = #{tenantId} AND imr.member_id = 1 AND hlr.data_type = 'ROLE' AND il.name = 'TENANT_ADMIN' OR ir.`code` = 'role/organization/default/administrator'

select.if:
SELECT 0 AS id, 'Choerodon' AS name, 'Choerodon' AS code, 1 AS is_enabled, imr.source_type, GROUP_CONCAT(concat(concat(concat(concat(ir.code, '|'), ir.name), '|'), ir.is_enabled)) AS roles, 'site' as image_url, null AS proj_name FROM iam_member_role imr INNER JOIN iam_role ir ON imr.role_id = ir.id WHERE imr.member_type = 'user' AND imr.source_type = 'site' AND imr.member_id = #{userId}
AND 'Choerodon' LIKE concat(concat('%', #{name}), '%')
AND 'Choerodon' LIKE concat(concat('%', #{params}), '%')
GROUP BY imr.source_type

SELECT fo.tenant_id AS id, fo.tenant_name AS name, fo.tenant_num AS code, fo.enabled_flag AS is_enabled, imr.source_type, GROUP_CONCAT(concat(concat(concat(concat(ir.code, '|'), ir.name), '|'), ir.is_enabled)) AS roles, 'organization' as image_url, null AS proj_name FROM iam_member_role imr INNER JOIN iam_role ir ON imr.role_id = ir.id INNER JOIN hpfm_tenant fo ON imr.source_id = fo.tenant_id WHERE imr.member_type = 'user' AND imr.source_type = 'organization' AND imr.member_id = #{userId} AND fo.enabled_flag = 1
AND fo.tenant_name LIKE concat(concat('%', #{name}), '%')
AND fo.tenant_name LIKE concat(concat('%', #{params}), '%')
group by fo.tenant_id

SELECT fp.id, CONCAT(fo.tenant_name, CONCAT(' / ', fp.name)) AS name, fp.code, fp.is_enabled, imr.source_type, GROUP_CONCAT(concat(concat(concat(concat(ir.code, '|'), ir.name), '|'), ir.is_enabled)) AS roles, fp.image_url, fp.name AS proj_name FROM iam_member_role imr INNER JOIN iam_role ir ON imr.role_id = ir.id INNER JOIN fd_project fp ON imr.source_id = fp.id INNER JOIN hpfm_tenant fo ON fp.organization_id = fo.tenant_id WHERE imr.member_type = 'user' AND imr.source_type = 'project' AND imr.member_id = #{userId} AND fp.is_enabled = 1
AND fp.name LIKE concat(concat('%', #{name}), '%')
AND fp.name LIKE concat(concat('%', #{params}), '%')
group by fp.id
